statements: UPDATE user_behavior SET total_interactions = total_interactions + 1, last_interaction = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_behavior SET email_address = 'example@gmail.com', purchase_count = 5 WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE user_behavior SET purchase_count = purchase_count + 1, last_interaction = '2023-11-15 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior SET total_interactions = total_interactions + 2, email_address = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET email_address='new.email@example.com', last_login=NOW() WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type='purchase', behavior_timestamp='2023-02-15 14:30:00' WHERE behavior_id=5;
UPDATE users SET email_address='john.doe@example.com', last_login=NOW(), user_name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_timestamp=NOW(), behavior_type='Login' WHERE user_id=1 AND behavior_id=1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'New Behavior', behavior_description = 'Updated description' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE email_marketing SET message_subject = 'New Subject', message_body = 'Updated body' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_description = 'Updated behavior description' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE email_marketing SET message_body = 'New message body', message_subject = 'Updated Subject' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET last_login = '2022-09-30' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_logs SET action_type = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 5 AND campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET last_login = '2022-03-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE campaign_logs SET action_type = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 456 AND campaign_id = 789;
UPDATE users SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, message_text = 'New message content' WHERE message_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2022-10-01', end_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
